**R. Howard Webster Foundation Fellowship** (2024) — *\$3,000 for 12 months*\
Recommended by Green College Principal Dr. Emma Cunliffe; awarded to residents demonstrating strong academic achievement and a strong Green College application.

**Canada Graduate Scholarships – Master’s (CGS-M)** (2023) — *\$27,000 for 12 months*\
Awarded to high-achieving graduate students to support research training and development.

**PAD Foreign Language Assistant Grant** (2023) — *€10,500 (≈\$15,550 CAD) for 10 months*\
Awarded by the Pädagogischer Austauschdienst (German Ministry of Education) to exceptional graduates supporting English language instruction in German secondary schools.

**Canadian Artistic Swimming League All-Canadian Award** (2021–2024)\
Recognizes student-athletes achieving honours academic standing while competing at an elite athletic level.

**Lindenwood University Academic Scholarship** (2017–2020) — *USD \$10,000 per year*\

**Lindenwood University Leadership Grant** (2017–2020) — *USD \$17,000 per year*

**BC Achievement Scholarship** (2017) — *\$1,250*\
Awarded to the top 8,000 graduates in British Columbia with the highest academic achievement.

**District/Authority Scholarship** (2017) — *\$1,250*\
Awarded to BC graduates demonstrating excellence in a chosen specialty area.
